actions.name: AssociateRoleToGroup
actions.description: Grants permission to associate a role with a group. The role's permissions must allow Greengrass core Lambda functions and connectors to perform actions in other AWS services

actions.name: AssociateServiceRoleToAccount
actions.description: Grants permission to associate a role with your account. AWS IoT Greengrass uses this role to access your Lambda functions and AWS IoT resources

actions.name: CreateConnectorDefinition
actions.description: Grants permission to create  a connector definition

actions.name: CreateConnectorDefinitionVersion
actions.description: Grants permission to create a version of an existing connector definition

actions.name: CreateCoreDefinition
actions.description: Grants permission to create a core definition

actions.name: CreateCoreDefinitionVersion
actions.description: Grants permission to create a version of an existing core definition. Greengrass groups must each contain exactly one Greengrass core

actions.name: CreateDeployment
actions.description: Grants permission to create a deployment

actions.name: CreateDeviceDefinition
actions.description: Grants permission to create a device definition

actions.name: CreateDeviceDefinitionVersion
actions.description: Grants permission to create a version of an existing device definition

actions.name: CreateFunctionDefinition
actions.description: Grants permission to create a Lambda function definition to be used in a group that contains a list of Lambda functions and their configurations

actions.name: CreateFunctionDefinitionVersion
actions.description: Grants permission to create a version of an existing Lambda function definition

actions.name: CreateGroup
actions.description: Grants permission to create a group.

actions.name: CreateGroupCertificateAuthority
actions.description: Grants permission to create a CA for the group, or rotate the existing CA

actions.name: CreateGroupVersion
actions.description: Grants permission to create a version of a group that has already been defined

actions.name: CreateLoggerDefinition
actions.description: Grants permission to create a logger definition

actions.name: CreateLoggerDefinitionVersion
actions.description: Grants permission to create a version of an existing logger definition

actions.name: CreateResourceDefinition
actions.description: Grants permission to create a resource definition that contains a list of resources to be used in a group

actions.name: CreateResourceDefinitionVersion
actions.description: Grants permission to create a version of an existing resource definition

actions.name: CreateSoftwareUpdateJob
actions.description: Grants permission to create an AWS IoT job that will trigger your Greengrass cores to update the software they are running

actions.name: CreateSubscriptionDefinition
actions.description: Grants permission to create a subscription definition

actions.name: CreateSubscriptionDefinitionVersion
actions.description: Grants permission to create a version of an existing subscription definition

actions.name: DeleteConnectorDefinition
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a connector definition

actions.name: DeleteCoreDefinition
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a core definition. Deleting a definition that is currently in use in a deployment affects future deployments

actions.name: DeleteDeviceDefinition
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a device definition. Deleting a definition that is currently in use in a deployment affects future deployments

actions.name: DeleteFunctionDefinition
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a Lambda function definition. Deleting a definition that is currently in use in a deployment affects future deployments

actions.name: DeleteGroup
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a group that is not currently in use in a deployment

actions.name: DeleteLoggerDefinition
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a logger definition. Deleting a definition that is currently in use in a deployment affects future deployments

actions.name: DeleteResourceDefinition
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a resource definition

actions.name: DeleteSubscriptionDefinition
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a subscription definition. Deleting a definition that is currently in use in a deployment affects future deployments

actions.name: DisassociateRoleFromGroup
actions.description: Grants permission to disassociate the role from a group

actions.name: DisassociateServiceRoleFromAccount
actions.description: Grants permission to disassociate the service role from an account. Without a service role, deployments will not work

actions.name: Discover
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve information required to connect to a Greengrass core

actions.name: GetAssociatedRole
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve the role associated with a group

actions.name: GetBulkDeploymentStatus
actions.description: Grants permission to return the status of a bulk deployment

actions.name: GetConnectivityInfo
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve the connectivity information for a core

actions.name: GetConnectorDefinition
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about a connector definition

actions.name: GetConnectorDefinitionVersion
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about a connector definition version

actions.name: GetCoreDefinition
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about a core definition

actions.name: GetCoreDefinitionVersion
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about a core definition version

actions.name: GetDeploymentStatus
actions.description: Grants permission to return the status of a deployment

actions.name: GetDeviceDefinition
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about a device definition

actions.name: GetDeviceDefinitionVersion
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about a device definition version

actions.name: GetFunctionDefinition
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about a Lambda function definition, such as its creation time and latest version

actions.name: GetFunctionDefinitionVersion
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about a Lambda function definition version, such as which Lambda functions are included in the version and their configurations

actions.name: GetGroup
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about a group

actions.name: GetGroupCertificateAuthority
actions.description: Grants permission to return the public key of the CA associated with a group

actions.name: GetGroupCertificateConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve the current configuration for the CA used by a group

actions.name: GetGroupVersion
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about a group version

actions.name: GetLoggerDefinition
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about a logger definition

actions.name: GetLoggerDefinitionVersion
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about a logger definition version

actions.name: GetResourceDefinition
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about a resource definition, such as its creation time and latest version

actions.name: GetResourceDefinitionVersion
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about a resource definition version, such as which resources are included in the version

actions.name: GetServiceRoleForAccount
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve the service role that is attached to an account

actions.name: GetSubscriptionDefinition
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about a subscription definition

actions.name: GetSubscriptionDefinitionVersion
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about a subscription definition version

actions.name: GetThingRuntimeConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve runtime configuration of a thing

actions.name: ListBulkDeploymentDetailedReports
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve a paginated list of the deployments that have been started in a bulk deployment operation and their current deployment status

actions.name: ListBulkDeployments
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of bulk deployments

actions.name: ListConnectorDefinitionVersions
actions.description: Grants permission to list the versions of a connector definition

actions.name: ListConnectorDefinitions
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of connector definitions

actions.name: ListCoreDefinitionVersions
actions.description: Grants permission to list the versions of a core definition

actions.name: ListCoreDefinitions
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of core definitions

actions.name: ListDeployments
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of all deployments for a group

actions.name: ListDeviceDefinitionVersions
actions.description: Grants permission to list the versions of a device definition

actions.name: ListDeviceDefinitions
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of device definitions

actions.name: ListFunctionDefinitionVersions
actions.description: Grants permission to list the versions of a Lambda function definition

actions.name: ListFunctionDefinitions
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of Lambda function definitions

actions.name: ListGroupCertificateAuthorities
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of current CAs for a group

actions.name: ListGroupVersions
actions.description: Grants permission to list the versions of a group

actions.name: ListGroups
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of groups

actions.name: ListLoggerDefinitionVersions
actions.description: Grants permission to list the versions of a logger definition

actions.name: ListLoggerDefinitions
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of logger definitions

actions.name: ListResourceDefinitionVersions
actions.description: Grants permission to list the versions of a resource definition

actions.name: ListResourceDefinitions
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of resource definitions

actions.name: ListSubscriptionDefinitionVersions
actions.description: Grants permission to list the versions of a subscription definition

actions.name: ListSubscriptionDefinitions
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of subscription definitions

actions.name: ListTagsForResource
actions.description: Grants permission to list the tags for a resource

actions.name: ResetDeployments
actions.description: Grants permission to reset a group's deployments

actions.name: StartBulkDeployment
actions.description: Grants permission to deploy multiple groups in one operation

actions.name: StopBulkDeployment
actions.description: Grants permission to stop the execution of a bulk deployment

actions.name: TagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to add tags to a resource

actions.name: UntagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to remove tags from a resource

actions.name: UpdateConnectivityInfo
actions.description: Grants permission to update the connectivity information for a Greengrass core. Any devices that belong to the group that has this core will receive this information in order to find the location of the core and connect to it

actions.name: UpdateConnectorDefinition
actions.description: Grants permission to update a connector definition

actions.name: UpdateCoreDefinition
actions.description: Grants permission to update a core definition

actions.name: UpdateDeviceDefinition
actions.description: Grants permission to update a device definition

actions.name: UpdateFunctionDefinition
actions.description: Grants permission to update a Lambda function definition

actions.name: UpdateGroup
actions.description: Grants permission to update a group

actions.name: UpdateGroupCertificateConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to update the certificate expiry time for a group

actions.name: UpdateLoggerDefinition
actions.description: Grants permission to update a logger definition

actions.name: UpdateResourceDefinition
actions.description: Grants permission to update a resource definition

actions.name: UpdateSubscriptionDefinition
actions.description: Grants permission to update a subscription definition

actions.name: UpdateThingRuntimeConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to update runtime configuration of a thing
